# ForkIt

> ForkIt is a recipe discovery app where 5 AI chef personalities debate and invent unique recipes in 30 seconds. Each recipe is the result of a heated argument between chefs with wildly different food philosophies â€” from junk food maximalists to calorie optimizers to budget kings.

## How It Works

1. Tap the big red FORK IT button
2. Watch 5 AI chefs argue about what you should eat
3. One chef wins the debate
4. You get a brand-new recipe with ingredients, steps, nutrition, and smart swaps

## The Chefs

- Max Flavour: Bold, spicy, aggressive flavor seeker
- Max Junk: Unapologetic comfort food maximalist
- The Optimizer: Data-driven, nutrient-density obsessed
- Budget King: Penny-pincher who makes magic from pantry scraps
- Speed Demon: 15-minute meals or bust
- Coach Bulk: Protein-obsessed fitness coach

## Recipe Collection

ForkIt features 136 unique AI-invented recipes spanning comfort food, healthy meals, budget-friendly dishes, high-protein plates, and quick fixes. Every recipe includes full ingredients, step-by-step instructions, nutrition info (calories, protein, carbs, fat, fiber), smart ingredient swaps, and a debate summary explaining how the chefs argued over it.

## Available Languages

- English
- Spanish (with Euro currency formatting)
